title: A narrative of the manner of celebrating his Majesties most glorious and joyfull coronation in the city of Bath, April 23. 1661. by the Mayor, aldermen and citizens thereof, and their adjoying neighbours of the gentry and commonalty; / sent in a letter from Iohn Ford, Esq; Mayor, of the city, to William Prynne, Esq; one of their elected citizens for the approaching Parliament.
author: Ford, John, Mayor of Bath.
publisher: Printed for Edward Thomas at the Adam and Eve in Little-britain,
notes: Dated and signed at end: Bathe 24. April 1661. John Ford.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
